ScenarioDef.description: After months of negotiation, you have been tasked with founding a Coreworld-backed colonial franchise. Like all colonial efforts you are to act as an extension of your franchise’s backer, exploring the world and exploiting its resources. It is your duty now to ensure profits rise with this venture, otherwise you will have your contracts revoked and your lives taken into collections.

scenario.name: Colonial Franchise
scenario.summary: A group of offworld contractors sent there by a coreworld organization. Strong Start.
scenario.description:
After months of negotiation, you have been tasked with founding a Coreworld-backed colonial franchise. Like all colonial efforts you are to act as an extension of your franchise’s backer, exploring the world and exploiting its resources. It is your duty now to ensure profits rise with this venture, otherwise you will have your contracts revoked and your lives taken into collections.
Note: Since you start with spacer level equipment, it will be an easy start against threats but your lack of materials will make starting hard.
